Name: ADT Pilot 01
About the game: Due to some unwanted circumstances, worlds are on the brink of demise. It is now up to you to determine the fate of the two dimensions. After getting the information you need from the auxiliary Artificial Intelligence, please make the decision you believe is the most justice. Gameplay In this interactive fiction, you get to play as the pilot of a critical mission, and by choosing dialogue branches and making decisions that will pose impacts on the two alternative dimensions, you would become the hero who saves humanity. Your participation in the operation is very much appreciated.
